title: Work-energy theorem - fan on box down ramp

content.question: A fan is attached to the top of a block, as shown. The block is released from rest at the top of a ramp and the fan exerts a constant force on the block opposite the blockâ€™s direction of motion. The block slides a distance <math alttext="D sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> along the ramp and then transitions to a horizontal surface, eventually coming to rest momentarily after traveling a distance <math alttext="D sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>. Frictional forces are negligible. Which of the following correctly describes the relationship between <math alttext="D sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="D sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="D sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> must be less than <math alttext="D sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>.

<math alttext="D sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> must be equal to <math alttext="D sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>.

<math alttext="D sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> must be greater than <math alttext="D sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>.

<math alttext="D sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> could be less than, equal to, or greater than <math alttext="D sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="D sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> could be less than, equal to, or greater than <math alttext="D sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>D</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
